sentences.english: No loss is a college student, conversation elegant, every act and every move all seem to be liberal and dignified.
sentences.chinese: 不亏是大学生，谈吐文雅，一举一动都显得落落大方。

sentences.english: Hold natural and graceful, don't hold back before the guests.
sentences.chinese: 在客人面前要落落大方，不要畏惧退缩不敢见人。

sentences.english: Being gracious even in disappointment is a sign of good manners.
sentences.chinese: 在失望中仍流露出落落大方的风范是有风度的表现。
